page.title: 14LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: Most industries are 'COTTAGE INDUSTRIES'. There are a few large industries such as {Spar }and the{ {Co.op. }There are lots of pubs. We visited a firm called {Collins {Fireplaces.}They make fireplaces from stone, which they get from all round the world e.g. Cotswolds,York,Forest of Dean,West Muland,Portugal and Germany. The firm is a family business as are most firms. The buildings in which the firm is situated was an old mill and there is still a passage going under it. They make about three fireplaces a week at roughly 200 per fireplace. There are seven pubs and all there breweries are{Manns.}Except for the{ {Cromwell Cottage}and the{Turnpike} which are 'Berni' steak houses. Most of the old people shop locally.Trade is small but thiving.
